channel.title: Writeup on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in Writeup on Policy to Packets

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Phishing Email
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a suspicious PayPal-themed email by reviewing headers, identifying a deceptive return path, extracting a URL hosted on a trusted platform, validating domain reputation, and confirming phishing activity leveraging living-off-trusted-sites techniques.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 86 - [SOC141 - Phishing URL Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a phishing URL alert after an endpoint connected to a malicious domain, validating reputation across multiple threat intelligence sources, identifying anomalous EDR logging, and initiating containment due to potential compromise.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 82 - [SOC140 - Phishing Mail Detected - Suspicious Task Scheduler]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a blocked phishing email with a malicious password-protected attachment, validating indicators through VirusTotal, Talos Intelligence, AbuseIPDB, and Hybrid Analysis, and confirming a true positive without endpoint impact.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 52 - [SOC120 - Phishing Mail Detected - Internal to Internal]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating an internal phishing detection, reviewing email details, validating absence of attachments or malicious content, and determining a false positive.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 45 - [SOC114 - Malicious Attachment Detected - Phishing Alert]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a malicious email attachment, validating malware in VirusTotal, identifying C2 communication in logs, deleting the phishing email, and initiating endpoint containment.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 93 - [SOC146 - Phishing Mail Detected - Excel 4.0 Macros]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a malware detection alert, analyzing a phishing email with malicious Excel attachment, validating indicators in VirusTotal, confirming C2 communication, and initiating endpoint containment.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Shellshock Attack
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing Shellshock attack activity in a PCAP file using Wireshark, identifying the target server details and the injected command.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Port Scan Activity
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing port scan activity in a PCAP file using Wireshark, identifying the scanning host, discovered systems, and network indicators.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - MSHTML
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing malicious Office documents exploiting MSHTML (CVE-2021-40444), using oletools to extract indicators, identify malicious domains and IPs, and investigate document-based exploitation.

item.title: [Writeup] HackTheBox Labs - Challenge - OnlyHacks
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Demonstrating cross-site scripting (XSS) exploitation, session cookie theft, and practical web application enumeration in a Very Easy web challenge.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Excel 4.0 Macros
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a malicious Excel 4.0 (XLM) macro document using XLMMacroDeobfuscator and oletools to identify process execution, regsvr32 abuse, and DLL payload behavior.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Malicious Doc
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a malicious Word document using VirusTotal to identify RTF exploit behavior, CVE-2017-11882 abuse, payload delivery, and network communication.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Remote Working
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a malicious XLS file using VirusTotal to identify detection signatures, dropped files, spyware download URLs, and file intelligence indicators.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Malicious VBA
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a malicious VBA macro document, decoding obfuscated hex strings, identifying payload delivery, and investigating HTTP communication and WMI execution techniques.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend Challenge - Learn Sigma
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Analyzing a Sigma rule for detecting bitsadmin.exe abuse, explaining rule structure, detection logic, and ransomware-related process_creation monitoring.

item.title: [Writeup] HackTheBox Labs - Challenge - Slippy
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Demonstrating Zip Slip exploitation, Jinja2 SSTI abuse, and Flask-based web application compromise within a Docker environment.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 84 - [SOC104 - Malware Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a malware detection alert, validating the WinRAR installer hash using VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, reviewing SIEM logs, and determining a false positive.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 257 - [SOC282 - Phishing Alert - Deceptive Mail Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a deceptive email alert, analyzing a malicious ZIP attachment in VirusTotal, identifying C2 communication, correlating SIEM logs, and initiating endpoint containment.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 92 - [SOC145 - Ransomware Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a true positive malware detection alert, validating Avaddon ransomware via VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, identifying EDR removal, and initiating endpoint containment from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 85 - [SOC109 - Emotet Malware Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating an Emotet malware detection alert, validating the hash in VirusTotal, reviewing SIEM and endpoint logs, and confirming a true positive successfully quarantined by EDR.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 36 - [SOC104 - Malware Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a malware detection alert, confirming Maze ransomware via VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, identifying C2 communication, and initiating containment.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 83 - [SOC119 - Proxy - Malicious Executable File Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a malicious executable detection alert, validating URL, domain, and IP reputation using VirusTotal and log analysis, and determining a false positive.

item.title: (Writeup) LetsDefend EventID: 14 - [SOC104 - Malware Detected]
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Investigating a malware detection alert, validating file reputation in VirusTotal, reviewing endpoint and log data, and determining a false positive.
